alert.note: Alert for Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 17 at 8:30PM CDT until September 17 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN POTTAWATTAMIE COUNTY... At 829 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Neola to 2 miles east of Crescent, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public reported quarter size hail in northern Omaha at 818 PM with this storm. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. These severe storms will be near... Neola and Minden around 835 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Shelby. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
